meanings.definition: The 19th letter of the Hebrew alphabet.
meanings.sent1: In Hebrew class, we learned about the letter koph.
meanings.sent2: Please write your name in Hebrew using koph as the 19th letter.
meanings.sent3: The koph letter looks like a little hill with a line on top.
meanings.sent4: Her handwriting was as elegant as the koph in the alphabet.
meanings.sent5: The koph stood out on the page, distinct from the other letters.

meanings.definition: A unit of angular measurement equal to 1/48 of a circle.
meanings.sent1: To measure the angle precisely, we used a koph.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter marked the wood with a koph to cut at the right angle.
meanings.sent3: The koph tool helped ensure the corners were perfectly aligned.
meanings.sent4: His precision was like a koph, always accurate and exact.
meanings.sent5: The koph measurement made the construction project error-free.

meanings.definition: A type of monkey found in Africa.
meanings.sent1: During our safari, we spotted a playful koph in the trees.
meanings.sent2: The koph swung gracefully from branch to branch in the jungle.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous koph stole some bananas from our campsite.
meanings.sent4: Her energy was contagious, like that of a koph in the wild.
meanings.sent5: The koph's call echoed through the African savanna, a sound of nature.
